| Cyclomatic complexity | | |

### Definition of Done
- [ ] Technical debt resolved
- [ ] Tests updated/added
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regression in functionality
- [ ] Performance maintained or improved
- [ ] Team knowledge shared

---

## üè∑Ô∏è Classification

### Type of Technical Debt
- [ ] **Deliberate/Prudent** - Known shortcut taken for valid reasons
- [ ] **Deliberate/Reckless** - Shortcut taken without consideration
- [ ] **Inadvertent/Prudent** - Learned better approach after implementation
- [ ] **Inadvertent/Reckless** - Poor practices without awareness

### Origin
- [ ] Legacy code
- [ ] Rapid prototyping
- [ ] Changing requirements
- [ ] Technology evolution
- [ ] Knowledge gaps
- [ ] Time pressure

### Age
- [ ] Recent (< 3 months)
- [ ] Moderate (3-12 months)
- [ ] Old (1-2 years)
- [ ] Ancient (> 2 years)
